segments.source_content:
---
slug: /migration/v2
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # Overview

translations.zh-hant: # 概述

segments.source_content: This doc guides you through migrating an existing Docusaurus 1 site to Docusaurus 2.

translations.zh-hant: 本文檔將引導您將現有的 Docusaurus 1 網站遷移至 Docusaurus 2。

segments.source_content: We try to make this as easy as possible, and provide a migration CLI.

translations.zh-hant: 我們盡可能簡化此過程，並提供遷移 CLI 工具。

segments.source_content: ## Main differences {#main-differences}

translations.zh-hant: ## 主要差異 {#main-differences}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus 1 is a pure documentation site generator, using React as a server-side template engine, but not loading React on the browser.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 1 是純粹的文檔網站生成器，使用 React 作為伺服器端模板引擎，但不在瀏覽器中載入 React。

segments.source_content: Docusaurus 2, rebuilt from the ground up, generates a single-page-application, using the full power of React in the browser. It allows for more customizability but preserved the best parts of Docusaurus 1 - easy to get started, versioned docs, and i18n.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 2 從頭重建，生成單頁應用程式，在瀏覽器中充分發揮 React 的威力。它提供了更高的可定制性，同時保留了 Docusaurus 1 的最佳特性——易於上手、版本化文檔和國際化支援。

segments.source_content: Beyond that, Docusaurus 2 is a **performant static site generator** and can be used to create common content-driven websites (e.g. Documentation, Blogs, Product Landing and Marketing Pages, etc) extremely quickly.

translations.zh-hant: 除此之外，Docusaurus 2 是一個**高效能的靜態網站生成器**，可快速建立各種內容驅動的網站（例如文檔、部落格、產品登陸頁和行銷頁面等）。

segments.source_content: While our main focus will still be helping you get your documentations right and well, it is possible to build any kind of website using Docusaurus 2 as it is just a React application. **Docusaurus can now be used to build any website, not just documentation websites.**

translations.zh-hant: 雖然我們的主要重點仍然是幫助您正確完善文檔，但由於 Docusaurus 2 本質上是一個 React 應用程式，**現在可以用它來建立任何類型的網站，而不僅僅是文檔網站**。

segments.source_content: ## Docusaurus 1 structure {#docusaurus-1-structure}

translations.zh-hant: ## Docusaurus 1 結構 {#docusaurus-1-structure}

segments.source_content: Your Docusaurus 1 site should have the following structure:

translations.zh-hant: 您的 Docusaurus 1 網站應具有以下結構：

segments.source_content:
```bash
├── docs
└── website
    ├── blog
    ├── core
    │   └── Footer.js
    ├── package.json
    ├── pages
    ├── sidebars.json
    ├── siteConfig.js
    └── static
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_3569d545

segments.source_content: ## Docusaurus 2 structure {#docusaurus-2-structure}

translations.zh-hant: ## Docusaurus 2 結構 {#docusaurus-2-structure}

segments.source_content: After the migration, your Docusaurus 2 site could look like:

translations.zh-hant: 遷移後，您的 Docusaurus 2 網站可能如下所示：

segments.source_content:
```sh
├── docs
└── website
    ├── blog
    ├── src
    │   ├── components
    │   ├── css
    │   └── pages
    ├── static
    ├── package.json
    ├── sidebars.json
    ├── docusaurus.config.js
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_026f2f3e

segments.source_content:
:::info

This migration does not change the `/docs` folder location, but Docusaurus v2 sites generally have the `/docs` folder inside `/website`

You are free to put the `/docs` folder anywhere you want after having migrated to v2.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

此遷移不會變更 `/docs` 資料夾的位置，但 Docusaurus v2 網站通常將 `/docs` 資料夾放在 `/website` 內

遷移至 v2 後，您可以自由將 `/docs` 資料夾放在任何位置。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Migration process {#migration-process}

translations.zh-hant: ## 遷移流程 {#migration-process}

segments.source_content: There are multiple things to migrate to obtain a fully functional Docusaurus 2 website:

translations.zh-hant: 要獲得功能完整的 Docusaurus 2 網站，需遷移多項內容：

segments.source_content:
- packages
- CLI commands
- site configuration
- Markdown files
- sidebars file
- pages, components and CSS
- versioned docs
- i18n support 🚧

translations.zh-hant:
- 套件
- CLI 指令
- 網站配置
- Markdown 檔案
- 側邊欄檔案
- 頁面、元件和 CSS
- 版本化文檔
- 國際化支援 🚧

segments.source_content: ## Automated migration process {#automated-migration-process}

translations.zh-hant: ## 自動化遷移流程 {#automated-migration-process}

segments.source_content: The [migration CLI](./migration-automated.mdx) will handle many things of the migration for you.

translations.zh-hant: [遷移 CLI](./migration-automated.mdx) 將為您處理遷移中的許多事項。

segments.source_content: However, some parts can't easily be automated, and you will have to fallback to the manual process.

translations.zh-hant: 然而，某些部分難以自動化，您仍需手動完成。

segments.source_content:
:::note

We recommend running the migration CLI, and complete the missing parts thanks to the manual migration process.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

我們建議先執行遷移 CLI，然後透過手動遷移流程完成剩餘部分。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Manual migration process {#manual-migration-process}

translations.zh-hant: ## 手動遷移流程 {#manual-migration-process}

segments.source_content: Some parts of the migration can't be automated (particularly the pages), and you will have to migrate them manually.

translations.zh-hant: 遷移的某些部分（特別是頁面）無法自動化，您需要手動遷移。

segments.source_content: The [manual migration guide](./migration-manual.mdx) will give you all the manual steps.

translations.zh-hant: [手動遷移指南](./migration-manual.mdx) 將提供所有手動步驟。

segments.source_content: ## Support {#support}

translations.zh-hant: ## 支援 {#support}

segments.source_content: For any questions, you can ask in the [`#migration-v1-to-v2` Discord channel](https://discord.gg/C3P6CxMMxY).

translations.zh-hant: 如有任何問題，您可以在 [`#migration-v1-to-v2` Discord 頻道](https://discord.gg/C3P6CxMMxY) 中提問。

segments.source_content: Feel free to tag [@slorber](https://github.com/slorber) in any migration PRs if you would like us to have a look.

translations.zh-hant: 如果您希望我們查看，歡迎在任何遷移 PR 中標記 [@slorber](https://github.com/slorber)。

segments.source_content: We also have volunteers willing to [help you migrate your v1 site](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/1834).

translations.zh-hant: 我們也有志願者願意[協助您遷移 v1 網站](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/1834)。

segments.source_content: ## Example migration PRs {#example-migration-prs}

translations.zh-hant: ## 遷移 PR 範例 {#example-migration-prs}

segments.source_content: You might want to refer to our migration PRs for [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app/pull/7785) and [Flux](https://github.com/facebook/flux/pull/471) as examples of how a migration for a basic Docusaurus v1 site can be done.

translations.zh-hant: 您可以參考我們針對 [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app/pull/7785) 和 [Flux](https://github.com/facebook/flux/pull/471) 的遷移拉取請求，作為基本 Docusaurus v1 網站遷移的範例。
